question.title: Fortify Issues -> lucene-core vulnerable due to Memory Allocation with Excessive Size Value
question.body:
lucene-core has vulnerable issue and caught in the sonatype-2025-000439. Fortify identified as High priority issue.

Is there any other ways to get rid of this issue from Fortify? Any work arounds can make it out from Fortify?

Unfortunately, no lucene-core versions without vulnerabilities available.

The lucene-core package is vulnerable due to Memory Allocation with Excessive Size Value. The growExact() method in the ArrayUtil class allocates unlimited new byte arrays on memory based on untrusted user input when parsing queries. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by crafting a malicious query, that, when processed by the affected library will cause an Out Of Memory exception possibly leading to a DoS condition.

Component Name: org.apache.lucene:lucene-core
